title: Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 19
description:
Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 19:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Alexander - Corporate Social Irresponsibility (2015)

-  Bains - Cultural DNA; the Psychology of Globalization (2015)

-  Buick & Crump - The Alternative to Capitalism (2013)

-  DeVos - Compassionate Capitalism; People Helping People Help Themselves (1993)

-  Fredrickson - Under the Bus; How Working Women Are Being Run Over (2015)

-  Gallagher - The Clash of Globalizations; Essays on the Political Economy of Trade and Development Policy (2013)

-  Gregory - The Devil Behind the Mirror; Globalization and Politics in the Dominican Republic (2014)

-  Hein - The Macroeconomics of Finance-dominated Capitalism-- and Its Crisis (2012)

-  Hirst et al - Globalization in Question, 3e (2009)

-  Irwin - The Free Market Existentialist; Capitalism without Consumerism (2015)

-  Kelly - The Case for Legalizing Capitalism (2010)

-  Kierzkowski (Ed.) - Europe and Globalization (2002)

-  Leicht & Fitzgerald - Middle Class Meltdown in America; Causes, Consequences, and Remedies, 2e (2014)

-  Marable - How Capitalism Underdeveloped Black America; Problems in Race, Political Economy, and Society (1983)

-  Mason - Postcapitalism; a Guide to Our Future (2015)

-  McQuaig & Brooks - The Trouble with Billionaires; How the Super-Rich Hijacked the World (2013)

-  Miller & Dinan - A Century of Spin; How Public Relations Became the Cutting Edge of Corporate Power (2008)

-  Mirrlees - Global Entertainment Media; Between Cultural Imperialism and Cultural Globalization (2013)

-  Moore - Capitalism in the Web of Life; Ecology and the Accumulation of Capital (2015)

-  Murphy - The Politically Incorrect Guide to Capitalism (2007)

-  Murray - What the Drug Companies Won't Tell You and Your Doctor Doesn't Know (2009)

-  Mutter - The Disaster Profiteers; How Natural Disasters Make the Rich Richer and the Poor Even Poorer (2015)

-  Nibert - Animal Oppression & Human Violence; Domesecration, Capitalism, and Global Conflict (2013)

-  Petras & Veltmeyer - Beyond Neoliberalism; a World to Win (2011)

-  Poole - Capitalism's Toxic Assumptions; Redefining Next Generation Economics (2015)

-  Reich - Saving Capitalism; For the Many, Not the Few (2015)

-  Roberts - The Failure of Laissez Faire Capitalism and Economic Dissolution of the West (2013)

-  Sassen - Expulsions; Brutality and Complexity in the Global Economy (2014)

-  Shaikh - Capitalism; Competition, Conflict, Crises (2016)

-  Shantz & Macdonald - Beyond Capitalism; Building Democratic Alternatives for Today and the Future (2013)

-  Smith - Imperialism in the Twenty-First Century; Globalization, Super-Exploitation, and Capitalism's Final Crisis (2016)

-  Suarez-Villa - Globalization and Technocapitalism; the Political Economy of Corporate Power and Technological Domination (2012)

-  Veltmeyer - Imperialism, Crisis and Class Struggle; the Enduring Verities and Contemporary Face of Capitalism (2010)

-  Wajcman - Pressed for Time; the Acceleration of Life in Digital Capitalism (2015)

-  Wall - Economics after Capitalism; a Guide to the Ruins and a Road to the Future, rev. ed. (2015)
